org.apache.flink.streaming.api.windowing.time

类 Time

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.windowing.time.Time

  • @Public
public final class Time
extends java.lang.Object
    The definition of a time interval for windowing. The time characteristic referred to is the default time characteristic set on the execution environment.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private long size
      The size of the windows generated by this policy.
      private java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit
      The time unit for this policy's time interval.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      限定符 构造器和说明
      private Time(long size, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
      Instantiation only via factory method.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法

      Creates a new Time that represents the given number of days.

      Gets the length of this policy's time interval.

      Creates a new Time that represents the given number of minutes.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getUnit

        public java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit getUnit()
        Gets the time unit for this policy's time interval.
        返回:
        The time unit for this policy's time interval.

      • getSize

        public long getSize()
        Gets the length of this policy's time interval.
        返回:
        The length of this policy's time interval.

      • toMilliseconds

        public long toMilliseconds()
        Converts the time interval to milliseconds.
        返回:
        The time interval in milliseconds.

      • of

        public static Time of(long size,
                      java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
        Creates a new Time of the given duration and TimeUnit.

        The Time refers to the time characteristic that is set on the dataflow via StreamExecutionEnvironment.setStreamTimeCharacteristic(org.apache.flink.streaming.api.TimeCharacteristic).

        参数:
        size - The duration of time.
        unit - The unit of time of the duration, for example TimeUnit.SECONDS.
        返回:
        The time policy.

      • milliseconds

        Creates a new Time that represents the given number of milliseconds.

      • days

        public static Time days(long days)
        Creates a new Time that represents the given number of days.
